title: The inspiring life of Jack Ma, Alibaba Founder

quotes: Jack Ma was born in Hangzhou in 1964 to a poor family in Communist China.
Things changed for the better in Hangzhou in 1972, when Richard Nixon, who was the President of the United States at the time, visited the city.
Ma graduated in 1988 and started applying for jobs, with little success.
After the birth of the internet, Ma got the chance to use it for the first time while visiting the US in 1995 to recover a payment for the translation business he had started.
By October 1999, Alibaba had gained $25 million
